Package uk.ac.ox.comlab.diadem.oxpath.utils

Interface Summary
DOMWindow Interface for representing web windows (HTML pages).
OXPathCache Interface that all OXPath memoized functions must support so that cached data relating to a page, P, can be cleared once P is closed by PAAT.
 

Class Summary
OXPathMemoizer This class is a general java memoizer that was retrieved from http://onjava.com/pub/a/onjava/2003/08/20/memoization.html?page=2 on 24 Sept 2011.
OXPathMemoizerNaive This class is a general java memoizer that was retrieved from http://onjava.com/pub/a/onjava/2003/08/20/memoization.html?page=2 on 24 Sept 2011.
PrintVisitor Simple visitor implementation to print out OXPath expressions into String objects that are encoded as AST trees.
Utils Class containing static helper methods for the web access layer.
 

Enum Summary
DOMEvent DOM Events for controlling input into the OXPathWebAccessNode.fireEvent(event) method by enumeration of each of the DOM 3 Events to fire.
 

Exception Summary
OXPathException class describing exception thrown if user-supplied OXPath script contains errors/is missing data
